listitem.para: enum FramePartLength { kFramePartLengthHeader = sizeof(FrameHeader) , kFramePartLengthCmdId = sizeof(FrameCmdId) , kFramePartLengthInterFrameHeader = sizeof(InterFrameHeader) , kFramePartLengthTail = sizeof(Crc16_t) , kFramePartLengthExceptData = kFramePartLengthHeader + kFramePartLengthCmdId + kFramePartLengthTail }

enum FramePartIndex { kFramePartIndexHeader = 0 , kFramePartIndexHeaderSof = 0 , kFramePartIndexHeaderDataLength = sizeof(FrameHeader::sof) , kFramePartIndexHeaderSequenceNumber = kFramePartIndexHeaderDataLength + sizeof(FrameHeader::data_length) , kFramePartIndexHeaderCrc = kFramePartIndexHeaderSequenceNumber + sizeof(FrameHeader::sequence_number) , kFramePartIndexCmdId = sizeof(FrameHeader) , kFramePartIndexData = kFramePartIndexCmdId + sizeof(FrameCmdId) }

enum FrameFrequence { kFrameFrequenceCompetitionStatus = 3u , kFrameFrequenceCompetitionResult = 0u , kFrameFrequenceCompetitionRobotsHp = 3u , kFrameFrequenceTeamEvent = 2u , kFrameFrequenceTeamSupplierAction = 0u , kFrameFrequenceTeamRefereeWarning = 0u , kFrameFrequenceRobotDartStatus = 3u , kFrameFrequenceRobotPerformance = 10u , kFrameFrequenceRobotPowerHeat = 50u , kFrameFrequenceRobotPosition = 10u , kFrameFrequenceRobotBuff = 3u , kFrameFrequenceRobotAerialStatus = 10u , kFrameFrequenceRobotDamage = 0u , kFrameFrequenceRobotShootData = 0u , kFrameFrequenceRobotProjectileAllowance = 10u , kFrameFrequenceRobotRfid = 3u , kFrameFrequenceRobotDartClientCommand = 10u , kFrameFrequenceRobotsGroundPosition = 1u , kFrameFrequenceRobotRadarMarkProgress = 1u , kFrameFrequenceInterAmongRobots = 10u , kFrameFrequenceInterCustomCtrllerToRobot = 30u , kFrameFrequenceInterClientMapToRobots = 0u , kFrameFrequenceInterCtrllerToRobot = 30u , kFrameFrequenceInterRadarMapToClient = 10u , kFrameFrequenceInterCustomCtrllerToClient = 30u , kFrameFrequenceInterSentryTrajectoryToClient = 1u }

section.title: 函数说明
section.section:
GetCrc16CheckSum() GetCrc16CheckSumhello_world::devices::referee hello_world::devices::refereeGetCrc16CheckSum
uint16_t hello_world::devices::referee::GetCrc16CheckSum (uint8_t * p_message, uint32_t length, uint16_t crc16_init)
Calculate and return the CRC16 checksum of a message.
This function iterates through the input message and computes the CRC16 checksum using the provided CRC16 initialization value.
参数
p_message
Pointer to the message data.
length
Length of the message in bytes.
crc8_init
Initial CRC16 value to start the checksum calculation.
返回
Calculated CRC16 checksum for the message.
在文件 referee_crc.cpp 第 191 行定义. 这是这个函数的调用关系图:

GetCrc8CheckSum() GetCrc8CheckSumhello_world::devices::referee hello_world::devices::refereeGetCrc8CheckSum
uint8_t hello_world::devices::referee::GetCrc8CheckSum (uint8_t * p_message, uint32_t length, uint8_t crc8_init)
Calculate and return the CRC8 checksum of a message.
This function iterates through the input message and computes the CRC8 checksum using the provided CRC8 initialization value.
参数
p_message
Pointer to the message data.
length
Length of the message in bytes.
crc8_init
Initial CRC8 value to start the checksum calculation.
返回
uint8_t
返回值
Calculated
CRC8 checksum for the message.
在文件 referee_crc.cpp 第 172 行定义. 这是这个函数的调用关系图:

SetEndCrc16CheckSum() SetEndCrc16CheckSumhello_world::devices::referee hello_world::devices::refereeSetEndCrc16CheckSum
bool hello_world::devices::referee::SetEndCrc16CheckSum (uint8_t * p_message, uint32_t length)
Set the last two bytes of a message to a CRC16 checksum.
This function calculates the CRC16 checksum of the input message and sets it as the last two bytes of the message.
参数
p_message
Pointer to the message data.
length
Length of the message in bytes.
返回
true if the CRC16 checksum is successfully set as the last two bytes, false otherwise.

bool hello_world::devices::referee::SetEndCrc8CheckSum (uint8_t * p_message, uint32_t length)
Set the last byte of a message to a CRC8 checksum.
This function calculates the CRC8 checksum of the input message and sets it as the last byte of the message.
参数
p_message
Pointer to the message data.
length
Length of the message in bytes.

true if the CRC8 checksum is successfully set as the last byte, false otherwise.

VerifyCrc16CheckSum() VerifyCrc16CheckSumhello_world::devices::referee hello_world::devices::refereeVerifyCrc16CheckSum
bool hello_world::devices::referee::VerifyCrc16CheckSum (uint8_t * p_message, uint32_t length)
Verifies the CRC16 checksum of a message.
This function calculates the expected CRC16 checksum of the input message and compares it to the last two bytes of the message to verify its integrity.
参数
p_message
Pointer to the message data.
length
Length of the message in bytes.
返回
true if the CRC16 checksum matches the last two bytes of the message, false otherwise.

VerifyCrc8CheckSum() VerifyCrc8CheckSumhello_world::devices::referee hello_world::devices::refereeVerifyCrc8CheckSum
bool hello_world::devices::referee::VerifyCrc8CheckSum (uint8_t * p_message, uint32_t length)
Verifies the CRC8 checksum of a message.
This function calculates the expected CRC8 checksum of the input message and compares it to the last byte of the message to verify its integrity.
参数
p_message[uint8_t
*] Pointer to the message data.
length[uint32_t]
Length of the message in bytes.
返回
true if the CRC8 checksum matches the last byte of the message, false otherwise.
